trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Chino
There were no other sightings in Chino on or around June 22nd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsEarly Sunday Morning aroung 12- am my family and I were sitting in our back yard, we were having a family gathering earlier that evening and the conversation of weird UFO dreams came up between my brother Javier and I. We were looking at the skies that night and spotted three different ball of light moving through the skies at rapid speed, all three at different times throughout the night. Closer to 1-am we saw a large ball of light come down and shoot through the sky; it looked to be near the 71fwy and 60fwy interchange- but in reality it may have been some where other. That was a cool night- It got me excited and wanting to see more...
Summary: Fire ball in the sky shot down with rapid speed- Chino, CA.
